mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes the articles entitled SQUARE DANCES "Between Those Ladies", "Broadmoor Promenade", and "Early Morning Breakdown". ROUND DANCES "Do-Sa-Do Mixer and Hitsitty-Hotsitty", "and "Blue Skirt Waltz". SPECIAL FEATURES "Fall Fun-Parties", "Levis and Laces, Their History", "Hints on Hospitality", "Square Dance Show-Boats", and "The Caller and Sound, Part III". REGULAR FEATURES "As I See It", "On Tour with Terry", "Woman on the Square (for the Ladies)", "Events Seen Thru the Square Dancer's Eye", "Square of the Month (Bud Udick)", "'Round the Outside Ring", "From the Floor (Letters to the Editor)", and "Calendar of Square Dancing Events". THE GREEN SHEET.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
